summary: Jon Jon Harris sees a ripe opportunity for a major party when he snags the job house-sitting for his rich Uncle Charles.
cast: Marques Houston|Kym Whitley|Alexis Fields|Dorien Wilson|Jerome Jones|Kelton Kessee|Meagan Good|Buddy Lewis|Mari Morrow|Dwan Smith|Jerry DeLoach|Donald Jarman|Shane Johnson|Henrietta Komras|Jamal Mixon|Jerod Mixon|Chris Stokes|Irene Stokes|Margaret Young
title: House Party 4: Down to the Last Minute
